definitions.title: n. [m.]
definitions.body: apple-tree, apple (from aromatic scent (breath), Thes Lag:BN 111, 129 Post (v. infr.); Ar. tuf=a0h.un is loan-wd. Frä: 140; on meaning apple v. Löw:No. 109 RS:JPh xiii. 65 f. Post:Hast. Dict. Bib. ‘ Apple ’)—
sg. [[תַּפּוּחַ]] apple-tree Joe 1:12, Ct So 2:3, So 8:5.
pl. [[תַּפּוּחִים]] apples Ct So 2:5, ´[[רֵיחַ אַפֵּךְ כַּתּ]] So 7:9; [[תַּפּוּחֵי זׇהָב]] Pr 25:4 (in sim.).
